item.title: getTommy
item.description: My personal website built using the Hugo static site generator. You’re on it right now but I though it might as well link the source code in the projects list. Since I don’t know much about Go I used one of the themes provided on the gohugo website called “Hugo Tania” and modified as well as simplified it to my liking. I find the Go syntax to be very confusing at times but since I only need a few basic page types it is totally worth it.
